alert.note: Alert for Cavalier; Eastern Walsh County; Grand Forks; Pembina; Richland; Traill; Western Walsh County (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 06 at 3:31AM CDT until October 07 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 possible. * WHERE...Portions of northwest and west central Minnesota and northeast and southeast North Dakota. * WHEN...From this evening through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Cavalier; Eastern Walsh County; Grand Forks; Pembina; Richland; Traill; Western Walsh County
